sections.text:
25-1327.Judicial sale; sheriff as master commissioner.

A sheriff may act as a master commissioner under subdivision (1)(b) of section 25-1326. Sales made under such subdivision shall conform in all respects to the laws regulating sales of land upon execution.

SourceR.S.1867, Code § 452, p. 468;R.S.1913, § 8020;C.S.1922, § 8961;C.S.1929, § 20-1327;R.S.1943, § 25-1327;Laws 2010, LB732, § 2.

Annotations

Officer cannot be compelled to advertise sale in any particular newspaper. State ex rel. Elliott v. Holliday, 35 Neb. 327, 53 N.W. 142 (1892).
